snippet: Dodging a scrum of reporters, former Prime Minister Silvio Berlusconi of Italy on Friday began serving his sentence for tax fraud at a nursing home outside Milan.
abstract: Former Italian Prime Min Silvio Berlusconi begins serving his sentence for tax fraud at a nursing home outside Milan.
lead_paragraph: Dodging a scrum of reporters, former Prime Minister Silvio Berlusconi of Italy on Friday began serving his sentence for tax fraud at a nursing home outside Milan.

headline.main: Italy: Berlusconi Begins His Community Service
headline.print_headline: Italy: Berlusconi Begins His Community Service
